info.description: Convoy is a fast and secure webhooks proxy. This document contains datastore.s API specification.
info.title: Convoy API Reference

get.description: This endpoint fetches the organisations a user is part of, this route can only be accessed with a personal api key
This endpoint fetches projects
This endpoint fetches a project by its id

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a project using its id

get.description: This endpoint fetches an endpoints
This endpoint fetches an endpoint

put.description: This endpoint expires the current endpoint secret and generates a new one.
put.summary: Expire and generate new application endpoint secret
Toggles an endpoint's status from active <-> inactive

get.description: This endpoint fetch event deliveries.

post.description: This endpoint resends multiple app events

get.description: This endpoint counts app events that will be affected by a batch retry operation

post.description: This endpoint force resends multiple app events

get.description: This endpoint fetches an event delivery.
This endpoint fetches an app message's delivery attempts
This endpoint fetches an app event delivery attempt

put.description: This endpoint resends an app event

get.description: This endpoint fetches app events with pagination

post.description: This endpoint creates an endpoint event

get.description: This endpoint counts events that will be affected by a batch replay operation

post.description: This endpoint uses the owner_id to fan out an event to multiple endpoints.
post.summary: Fan out an event to multiple endpoints.

get.description: This endpoint fetches an endpoint event

put.description: This endpoint replays an endpoint event

get.description: This endpoint fetches multiple portal links

post.description: This endpoint creates a portal link

get.description: This endpoint fetches a portal link by its id

put.description: This endpoint updates a portal link
This endpoint revokes a portal link

get.description: This endpoint fetches multiple sources
This endpoint fetches a source by its id
This endpoint fetches all the subscriptions

post.description: This endpoint tests a subscription's filter

get.description: This endpoint fetches an Subscription by it's id

put.summary: Toggles a subscription's status from active <-> inactive

get.description: This endpoint fetches all portal link devices
This endpoint fetches all portal link endpoints
This endpoint fetches all portal link endpoints keys

post.description: This endpoint verifies a user's email
This endpoint resets a users password
